Description:
After further review, we are not able to roll this out to DoD, thank you for your patience. This feature, available in the new Teams experience on Windows, enables you to mute and unmute your audio by clicking the mic icon in Windows taskbar. To control your mic during the meeting from the taskbar, do the following: select the mic icon on your taskbar or press Windows logo key + Alt + K to mute or unmute.
GA date: June CY2024
Title: Microsoft Teams: Control your mic state during meetings from Windows taskbar available in the new Teams on Windows
